title: How a Thermodynamic Version of the Friedmann Equation Appears to Solve the Early Galaxy Formation Problem
content: Based on our recent thermodynamic formulation of the Friedmann equation, we demon- strate how the age of the universe must be approximately 14.6 billion years. This is about 800 million years older than predicted by the Î›-CDM model and therefore greatly alleviates the early galaxy formation problem.
